attributes.action: Limit the dates that fireworks can be used within the U.K.
attributes.additional_details: it is unfair that animals should suffer and owners should have no idea as to the constant use of fireworks. if this was limited to even one week the owners could mitigate the stress caused upon their pet and livestock.
attributes.background: Limit the dates that fireworks can legally be used within the u,k, by law and enforce its use.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559397

If you want the use of fireworks to be limited to dates other than the above, you could start a new petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear what dates you want firework use to be restricted to.
